snippet.title: Miner 2049er (C64 - FULL GAME)
snippet.description:
Zeus presents Miner 2049er (un-emulated) for the C64, a true classic from the golden era of c64 gaming which must not be forgotten alongside the software house and all programmers that were involved in making this game.

Year of release: 1982

Classic game on the Atari 8-bit and a pretty good version here on the C64 too.
Guide Bob around the 10 mines painting in the platforms whilst collecting bonuses to kill the mutants that are determined to stop Bob at all costs.
Full longplay here without commentary which is a follow on to my "Let's Longplay" of this game with commentary: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iP8ijX-42Gk

I hope all you retro game fans enjoy this upload especially enough to subscribe if you haven't already :-)

Please note: NONE of my game uploads are emulated in any way whatsoever, they are 100% original recordings by myself taken directly from the original hardware the game was intended for, that way you know you're watching the real thing.
I will also always state weather i am using any cheats in the game, if not mentioned then i am not using any.
Check out my channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/ZEUSDAZ/videos), dedicated to gamers who loved the games of yesteryear.

Switch to 480p for best video quality and feel free to leave comments on my channel and vid's.

Keeping the memory of the c64 and it's cool games alive!!!
